testCase.name: IndexComponent should render the component without crashing
IndexComponent should display the correct title and breadcrumbs based on the investmentType parameter
IndexComponent should render the correct form step based on the step state
code snippet should render the customer information form when step is 1
code snippet should render the customer information form when step is 2
code snippet should pass the 'proceed' function to the 'CustomerInformation' component
code snippet should allow the user to input customer information
code snippet should handle invalid input data correctly
Test App Component If App is rendered wihout issues
